title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even if the build is already done and no manual build is required.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled when a manual build is required or if the build process has not been completed yet.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Trigger a build process.
3. Verify that the "Build" popup action is enabled.
4. Repeat step 2 and verify that the "Build" popup action is not enabled this time since the build is already done.
